name: RogueRats
description:
RogueRats is a simple roguelite with cooperative asynchronous multiplayer. After dying, your attempt is saved and can be retried alongside your previous character. Share the save file to allow someone else to attempt the level with your rat.

Arrow keys to move, z to attack, x to interact.

Play at your own risk, there are several bugs I didn't have time to fix. Exporting save files is a little buggy.
